{{cpp/experimental/ostream_joiner/title|operator*}}

ostream_joiner&amp; operator*() noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Does nothing, this member function is provided to satisfy the requirements of {{named req|OutputIterator}}.

It returns the iterator itself, which makes it possible to use code such as {{c|1=*iter = value}} to output (insert) the value into the underlying stream.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
{{c|*this}}
